name: Faculty of Business & Languages
description: Main hub for Business, Humanities, and Language departments. Contains lecture halls and staff offices.

name: Block C - Computing & Engineering
description: The primary building for Informatics and Engineering labs, high-tech classrooms, and workshops.

name: Block D - Horticulture & Science
description: Specialized building for Science labs and Horticultural studies, including greenhouse access.

name: Block E - Learning & Innovation
description: Research and innovation center. Focuses on industry collaboration and incubator space.

name: Campus Library & Information Office
description: Central study area, book collections, computer labs, and student support services.

name: Sports Centre
description: Student gym, multi-purpose sports hall, and changing facilities.

name: Student Canteen & Common Area
description: Main dining area, coffee shop, and student social spaces.

name: Connect Building
description: Central administration, student services desk, and admissions.

name: Student Union
description: Offices for the Student Union representatives and welfare support.

name: North Car Park
description: Main visitor and staff parking located at the northern edge of campus.
